channel.title: Pk points and automatic pk point shop(delta)
channel.description:
okay i saw this off a server pk planet i want to add it to my server it looks cool but idk how to add these and i dont want to do it and mess up alot and get over 100 errors so im going to decide to ask these are the things i need help with.
1. i want to add pk points it shows that it has pk points but dont think it works but its in the skill tabs and it's at the bottom by the combat level and says pk. I want to give every time you kill a person(differnt ip if its not hard) you get 2 pk points.
2.I want a automatic pk point you type ::rewards and then like a command thing pops up that shows what you can do and it list all these commands (e.g ::vls and you get vls and takes like 200 points from your pk points)if you need a list of the rewads i want im not sure if you do post a comment that you do and ill post them.
ty for taking your time reading.

item.title: Pk points and automatic pk point shop(delta)
item.dc:creator: @i0wn3v3ry i0wn3v3ry
item.description:
@i0wn3v3ry wrote:

I’m not sure I’ve seen a tutorial like this, but there are plenty of other versions, search google, r-s, and here, just look around and browse.

Read full topic
item.source: Pk points and automatic pk point shop(delta)
